info.name: Provisioning service
info.description:
(D.03.08.10000) Provisioning service for St√∏ttesystem Context Handler

Contact Support:
 Name: Martin Strandbygaard / Safewhere

request.description: Validates SAML metadata for a BrugervendteSystem (Service Provider). Performs comprehensive validation including schema compliance (SAML 2.0 metadata XSD), OCES3 certificate validation and uniqueness checks, endpoint binding validation (AssertionConsumerService must use HTTP-POST, SingleLogoutService must use HTTP-Redirect), metadata signature validation, and KeyDescriptor validation. Requires client certificate authentication.

response.name: Validation successful. Returns the entityID of the validated EntityDescriptor.
Validation successful with warning: metadata is not signed
Invalid data supplied: SPSSODescriptor must have an AssertionConsumerService endpoint using the HTTP-POST binding
Service unavailable: The metadata URL is not found or not accessible.

item.name: Validate Identity Provider SAML metadata's IDPSSODescriptor

request.description: Validates SAML metadata for an Identity Provider. Performs comprehensive validation including schema compliance (SAML 2.0 metadata XSD), OCES3 certificate validation and uniqueness checks, endpoint binding validation (SingleSignOnService must use HTTP-Redirect, SingleLogoutService must use HTTP-Redirect), metadata signature validation, and KeyDescriptor validation. Requires client certificate authentication.

response.name: Validation successful. Returns the entityID of the validated metadata.
Validation successful with warning: metadata is not signed
Invalid data supplied: IDPSSODescriptor does not have SingleLogoutService and SingleSignOnService endpoints using the HTTP-Redirect binding
Service unavailable: The metadata URL is not found or not accessible.
